content.raw:
I'm getting locally the same test failure as Jenkins, can you reproduce it?

~~~
21: [ RUN      ] IfaceTest.loadDisplayPlugin
21: [GUI] [Err] [Iface.cc:98] Application not initialized. Have you called initApp() yet?
21/78 Test #21: UNIT_Iface_TEST .........................***Exception: SegFault  0.25 sec
~~~

Backtrace:

~~~
Thread 1 "UNIT_Iface_TEST" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff5ac1539 in tinyxml2::XMLElement::FindAttribute(char const*) const ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtinyxml2.so.2
(gdb) bt
#0  0x00007ffff5ac1539 in tinyxml2::XMLElement::FindAttribute(char const*) const () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtinyxml2.so.2
#1  0x00007ffff5ac15fe in tinyxml2::XMLElement::Attribute(char const*, char const*) const () from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtinyxml2.so.2
#2  0x00007ffff7b735db in ignition::gui::DisplayPlugin::Load (this=0x6f1e80, 
    _pluginElem=_pluginElem@entry=0x0)
    at /home/developer/code/ign-gui/src/DisplayPlugin.cc:69
#3  0x00007ffff7b81341 in ignition::gui::loadDisplayPlugin (
    _filename="GridDisplay", _pluginElem=_pluginElem@entry=0x0)
    at /home/developer/code/ign-gui/src/Iface.cc:566
~~~
content.html:
I'm getting locally the same test failure as Jenkins, can you reproduce it?

21: [ RUN      ] IfaceTest.loadDisplayPlugin
21: [GUI] [Err] [Iface.cc:98] Application not initialized. Have you called initApp() yet?
21/78 Test #21: UNIT_Iface_TEST .........................***Exception: SegFault  0.25 sec

Backtrace:

Thread 1 "UNIT_Iface_TEST" received signal SIGSEGV, Segmentation fault.
0x00007ffff5ac1539 in tinyxml2::XMLElement::FindAttribute(char const*) const ()
   from /usr/lib/x86_64-linux-gnu/libtinyxml2.so.2
(gdb) bt
